00097     // Constants used for the Orientation Exif tag.
00098     enum Orientations {
00099         ORIENTATION_UNDEFINED = 0,
00100         ORIENTATION_NORMAL = 1,
00101         ORIENTATION_FLIP_HORIZONTAL = 2,  // left right reversed mirror
00102         ORIENTATION_ROTATE_180 = 3,
00103         ORIENTATION_FLIP_VERTICAL = 4,  // upside down mirror
00104         ORIENTATION_TRANSPOSE = 5,  // flipped about top-left <--> bottom-right axis
00105         ORIENTATION_ROTATE_90 = 6,  // rotate 90 cw to right it
00106         ORIENTATION_TRANSVERSE = 7,  // flipped about top-right <--> bottom-left axis
00107         ORIENTATION_ROTATE_270 = 8  // rotate 270 to right it
00108     };
00109
